Getting started

Source: vignettes/pharmOncoX.Rmd
pharmOncoX.Rmd



Installation 


if (!("remotes" %in% installed.packages()) {
  install.packages("remotes")
}
remotes::install_github('sigven/pharmOncoX')



Retrieval of drugs - examples

Get BRAF-targeted drugs, list records per indication 

library(pharmOncoX)

## load the data
cache_dir <- tempdir()

drugs <- get_drugs(
  cache_dir = cache_dir,
  drug_targeted_agent = T,
    drug_target = c('BRAF'))
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:03] Downloading remote dataset from Google Drive to cache_dir
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:05] Reading from cache_dir = ' (/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX'), argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:05] Object 'drug_map_name' sucessfully loaded

#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:08] Object 'drug_map_alias' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:08] md5 checksum is valid: ae1850b762ed5fb46edbc07a0e2b4018

## Number of drug records
nrow(drugs$records)
#> [1] 240

#> [35] "atc_level2"                   "atc_code_level3"             
#> [37] "atc_level3"



Get BRAF-targeted drugs, Open Targets Platform only, list per drug only 


drugs <- get_drugs(
  cache_dir = cache_dir, 
  drug_targeted_agent = T,
  drug_action_inhibition = T,
    drug_target = c('BRAF'), 
  drug_source_opentargets = T, 
  output_resolution = "drug" )

drugs$records <- drugs$records |>
  dplyr::select(
    -c("drug_alias",
       "disease_main_group",
       "drug_clinical_id")) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    disease_indication = stringr::str_replace_all(
      disease_indication, "\\|",", ")
    )

dt_drugtable_braf_inhibitors <- DT::datatable(
  drugs$records,
  escape = FALSE,
  extensions = c("Buttons", "Responsive"), 
  width = "100%",
  options = list(
    buttons = c("csv", "excel"), 
    dom = "Bfrtip")
)




Get immune checkpoint inhibitors, list per drug-target entry 


drugs <- get_drugs(
  cache_dir = cache_dir, 
  drug_source_opentargets = F,
  drug_classified_cancer = T,
   output_resolution = "drug2target")

drugs$records <- drugs$records |>
  dplyr::filter(
    ((!is.na(atc_level3) & 
      atc_level3 == "PD-1/PDL-1 inhibitors") |
     (!is.na(target_symbol) &
      target_symbol == "CTLA4" |
      target_symbol == "TIGIT"))
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(
    -c("drug_alias",
       "disease_main_group",
       "drug_clinical_id")) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    disease_indication = stringr::str_replace_all(
      disease_indication, "\\|",", ")
    ) |>
  dplyr::select(
    drug_id,
    drug_name,
    drug_type,
    target_symbol,
    target_genename,
    dplyr::everything()
  )

dt_drugtable_ici <- DT::datatable(
  drugs$records,
  escape = FALSE,
  extensions = c("Buttons", "Responsive"), 
  width = "100%",
  options = list(
    buttons = c("csv", "excel"), 
    dom = "Bfrtip")
)




Get immune checkpoint inhibitors indicated for tumor subtypes within “Colon/Rectum”, list per drug-target entry 


drugs <- get_drugs(
  cache_dir = cache_dir, 
  output_resolution = "drug2target", 
  drug_source_opentargets = T,
  drug_indication_main = "Colon/Rectum")

drugs$records <- drugs$records |>
  dplyr::filter(
     ((!is.na(atc_level3) & 
      atc_level3 == "PD-1/PDL-1 inhibitors") |
     (!is.na(target_symbol) &
      target_symbol == "CTLA4" |
      target_symbol == "TIGIT"))
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(
    -c("drug_alias",
       "disease_main_group",
       "drug_clinical_id")) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    disease_indication = stringr::str_replace_all(
      disease_indication, "\\|",", ")
    ) |>
  dplyr::select(
    drug_id,
    drug_name,
    drug_type,
    target_symbol,
    target_genename,
    dplyr::everything()
  )

dt_drugtable_ici_colon <- DT::datatable(
  drugs$records,
  escape = FALSE,
  extensions = c("Buttons", "Responsive"), 
  width = "100%",
  options = list(
    buttons = c("csv", "excel"), 
    dom = "Bfrtip")
)




Get antimetabolite drugs 


drugs <- get_drugs(
  cache_dir = cache_dir, 
  output_resolution = "drug")
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:44] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:44] Object 'drug_map_name' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:44] Retrieved n = 30023 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Object 'drug_map_alias' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Retrieved n = 654542 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Object 'drug_map_basic' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Retrieved n = 30948 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Object 'drug_map_target' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Retrieved n = 37917 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Object 'drug_map_indication' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:45] Retrieved n = 58689 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:49] Record set satisfying user-defined criteria: n = 74635
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:49] Collapsing record set - providing output on a 'per_drug' resolution
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:50] Final record set: n = 1162 records

drugs$records <- drugs$records |>
  dplyr::filter(
    stringr::str_detect(
      atc_level2, "ANTIMETABOLITES"
    )
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(
    -c("drug_alias",
       "disease_main_group",
       "drug_clinical_id")) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    disease_indication = stringr::str_replace_all(
      disease_indication, "\\|",", ")
    )

dt_drugtable_metabolites <- DT::datatable(
  drugs$records,
  escape = FALSE,
  extensions = c("Buttons", "Responsive"), 
  width = "100%",
  options = list(
    buttons = c("csv", "excel"), 
    dom = "Bfrtip")
)




Get taxanes 


drugs <- get_drugs(
  cache_dir = cache_dir, 
  output_resolution = "drug")
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:50] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:50] Object 'drug_map_name' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:50] Retrieved n = 30023 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Object 'drug_map_alias' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Retrieved n = 654542 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Object 'drug_map_basic' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Retrieved n = 30948 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Object 'drug_map_target' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Retrieved n = 37917 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Object 'drug_map_indication' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:51] Retrieved n = 58689 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:55] Record set satisfying user-defined criteria: n = 74635
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:55] Collapsing record set - providing output on a 'per_drug' resolution
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:56] Final record set: n = 1162 records

drugs$records <- drugs$records |>
  dplyr::filter(
    stringr::str_detect(
      atc_level3, "Taxanes"
    )
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(
    -c("drug_alias",
       "disease_main_group",
       "drug_clinical_id")) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    disease_indication = stringr::str_replace_all(
      disease_indication, "\\|",", ")
    )

dt_drugtable_taxanes <- DT::datatable(
  drugs$records,
  escape = FALSE,
  extensions = c("Buttons", "Responsive"), 
  width = "100%",
  options = list(
    buttons = c("csv", "excel"), 
    dom = "Bfrtip")
)




Get platinum compounds 


drugs <- get_drugs(
  cache_dir = cache_dir, 
  output_resolution = "drug")
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:56] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:56] Object 'drug_map_name' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:56] Retrieved n = 30023 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Object 'drug_map_alias' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Retrieved n = 654542 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Object 'drug_map_basic' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Retrieved n = 30948 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Object 'drug_map_target' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Retrieved n = 37917 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Reading from cache_dir = '/tmp/RtmpcDMOTX', argument force_download = F
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Object 'drug_map_indication' sucessfully loaded
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:00:57] Retrieved n = 58689 records
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:01:01] Record set satisfying user-defined criteria: n = 74635
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:01:01] Collapsing record set - providing output on a 'per_drug' resolution
#> INFO  [2023-06-28 18:01:02] Final record set: n = 1162 records

drugs$records <- drugs$records |>
  dplyr::filter(
    stringr::str_detect(
      atc_level3, "Platinum compounds"
    )
  ) |>
  dplyr::select(
    -c("drug_alias",
       "disease_main_group",
       "drug_clinical_id")) |>
  dplyr::mutate(
    disease_indication = stringr::str_replace_all(
      disease_indication, "\\|",", ")
    )

dt_drugtable_platins <- DT::datatable(
  drugs$records,
  escape = FALSE,
  extensions = c("Buttons", "Responsive"), 
  width = "100%",
  options = list(
    buttons = c("csv", "excel"), 
    dom = "Bfrtip")
)
